pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.39: Jānāhi. This verb, which normally means “to understand” or “to find out”, is very flexible in its usage.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.43: The point here and below is that each prompting is equivalent to two standings. You can choose one or the other.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.4.5: I translate according to the gloss in the Kaṅkhāvitaraṇī commentary, sāmikehi codetvā dinne, “After prompting by the owners, it is given.”
